tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cell_imaging_data (
  image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_data BYTEA,
  cell_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingData (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 image_id INT,
 true_label VARCHAR(50),
 predicted_label VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES CellImages(image_id)
);
